game.name: Absolute Tennis Manager 2
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build and manage a professional tennis career — training, tactics, travel, staff, injuries, finances and personal life. Will you reach the Hall of Fame?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build and manage a professional tennis career — training, tactics, travel, staff, injuries, finances and personal life. Will you reach the Hall of Fame?
